scripts.start: npm run tailwind && ELEVENTY_ENV=development npx eleventy --serve --watch
scripts.build: npm run tailwind:build && ELEVENTY_ENV=production npx eleventy
scripts.tailwind: NODE_ENV=development tailwindcss build src/assets/styles/tailwind.css -o src/assets/styles/styles.css -c tailwind.config.js
scripts.tailwind:build: NODE_ENV=production tailwindcss build src/assets/styles/tailwind.css -o src/assets/styles/styles.css -c tailwind.config.js
